title: Mystery Gifting
body: I'm I just slow or are we unable to mystery gift ourselves in the current client? I can't seem to find that option anywhere in the store.

replies.body: [**Mystery Gifting**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752934-Mystery-Gifting-FAQ) yourself is something that only occasionally opens up for certain events. At the moment, those mystery gifts are only available for gifting others.

Thanks for the Clarification Broporo. I actually forgot this because of how rarely I've used the shop recently. Also, does big brother Riot have a stance on people creating smurfs and then mystery gifting their main accounts via their smurfs?
Hmmmmmm I don't believe we have an official stance on that! We don't mind people making smurfs, and if you're willing to gift your main from a smurf that's completely fine ^_^!
